channel.title: [317] Custom Maker Pack + tutorial! [317]
channel.description:
[size=14pt]Hey guys, today ima be learning you how to make custom weapons for 317 rsps servers... I have released a little pack for people to use, it includes everything you need to become a successfull custom maker...[/size]
[size=12pt] Lets start, im gonna be linking to youtube tutorials because i cant write everything in this post... 50% for me doing the pack and programs 50% to Burpscape for doing the tutorials (subscribe him) [/size]
[b]Software you need:[/b]
Winrar: http://www.rarlab.com/download.htm custom maker Pack v1 download: http://www.mediafire.com/?boxg313x4yhps3x [u]Im hoping you already have a server so i do not need to post link on that xD[/u]
[b]Tutorials: (dont download the file in the video description, its outdated...)[/b] Part1: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eXR66QNKeVE Part2: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TXaGeEwIbsA&feature=relmfu Part3: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_G_AxmZIriY&feature=relmfu Part4: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4bXYZtirXaI&feature=relmfu
Hope You enjoy :) No hatin' on me right? Feedback Below please (:
Thanks
vilan22 // KrandorScape
